titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Illinois Central Railroad Company Records1851-1859

did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Scrapbook of typescript, manuscript, and printed material relating to the Illinois Central Railroad Company, Galena and Chicago Union Railroad, John Frink Express Company, and American Express Company. Includes letters, instructions to agents, orders, bills, receipts, contracts, rates of fare, and additional reports of local railroads and other companies, including Western Union.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Illinois Central Railroad Company Records, Crerar Ms 191, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of typescript, manuscript, and printed material relating to the Illinois Central Railroad Company, Galena and Chicago Union Railroad, John Frink Express Company, and American Express Company. Includes letters, instructions to agents, orders, bills, receipts, contracts, rates of fare, and additional reports of local railroads and other companies, including Western Union.
